description:
Fire meets ice as mythical warriors, erupting admirals, legendary pirates, and a giant giant go head to head in the biggest, baddest battle of all time! There`s only one thing missing: Monkey D. Luffy!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: An All-Consuming Inferno!! Admiral Akainu`s Power!
Réduisez tout en cendres ! Les pouvoirs de l`Amiral Akainu !
Subete o Yakitsukusu!! Taishou Akainu no Chikara!
جحيم تلتهم كلّ شيء! قوّة الأميرال أكاينو!
すべてを焼き尽くす!! 大将赤犬の能力!
